meanings.sent1: She was skivvying by cleaning the floors in the mansion.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, he starts skivvying by dusting the furniture.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried skivvying by attempting to sweep the kitchen floor with its tail.
meanings.sent4: The sun skivvied across the sky, bringing light to the world.
meanings.sent5: Skivvying felt like carrying the weight of the world on her shoulders.
